title: #237 - Buddhist Dualism and The Need For Empirical Investigation
itunes:title: #237 - Buddhist Dualism and The Need For Empirical Investigation
description: Y'all know what we mean when we say Dualism? Hopefully you will by the mid-way point of this episode because Connor and Dan go down some hippie dippy pathways this week to explore the non-traditional philosophy of Buddhist Dualism. Dip your mind back into the substrate consciousness for a minute and do some empirical research...baby!
